content:
The total fighting loss of the enemy from 24.02.22 to 06.03.24 are approximately:

  • personnel - 420270 (+1250) persons liquidated
  • tanks - 6678 (+21)
  • combat armored vehicles - 12728 (+40)
  • artillery systems - 10308 (+50)
  • RSW - 1008 (+1)
  • air defense facilities - 701 (+1)
  • aircraft - 347 (0)
  • helicopters - 325 (0)
  • UAV Operative-tactical level-7921 (+58)
  • Winged rockets - 1918 (+1)
  • ships / boats - 26 (+1)
  • submarines - 1 (0)
  • automobile equipment and tanks - 13479 (+56)
  • Special Technique - 1642 (+12)

The data is specified ...

Beat the occupier! Let's win together! Our strength is in truth!

Source: General Staff of the Armed Forces of Ukraine as of 06.03.24.
title: RF loss per day: minus 1250 invaders, more than 60 units of armored vehicles and a drowning ship
author: Army Inform
